thread.title: Geopulse Hires Auditor, Moving Towards Fully Reporting Status

author: cnbc.com
title: Geopulse Hires Auditor, Moving Towards Fully Reporting Status
text:
LOS ANGELES, CA, March 09, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Geopulse Exploration, Inc. (OTC PINK: GPLS): CannCo Brands & Development, Inc., (f/k/a Geopulse Exploration, Inc.) (OTC Pink: GPLS) (the “Company”) announces today that it has engaged DMCL Chartered Professional Accountants to perform an audit of the Company’s financials in anticipation of becoming a fully-reporting issuer under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.
Upon completion of the audit, the company will re-apply to receive a name change approval by the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA) which had previously denied the Company’s request. In the interim, the Company will be changing its name back to Geopulse Exploration, Inc. from CannCo Brands & Development. We will continue and update our shareholders and investors as events materialize.
About Geopulse Explorations, and Growth Circle
Growth Circle develops and distributes marketing and financial content for emerging growth companies including medicinal cannabis related entities. The Company's flagship product is a documentary style video of its client's management teams -- explaining the motivation and vision of management -- with a focus on the investment merits of the client. As disclosed in the press release of August 2017, the Company intends to make acquisitions and operate in the medicinal cannabis industry.
